<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_properties</collection> <condition>current.name == "com.snc.sla.engine.version" && current.value.changes()</condition> <description>Update SLA Engine business rules, and SLA triggers, when the SLA Engine version is changed</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>SLA Engine version changed</name> <order>110</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[changeSLAEngineVersionOption();
function changeSLAEngineVersionOption() { if (current.value == '2010') SLAEngineChange.switchTo2010(); else if (current.value == '2011' && SLAEngineChange.checkSLAcalc2011()) SLAEngineChange.switchTo2011(); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>james.grinter</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-05-31 13:12:55</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>02d98c5e9f5220007bb2ed93ee4bcc55</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SLA Engine version changed</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Service level management" source="com.snc.sla">e2d7bc6c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f1f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_02d98c5e9f5220007bb2ed93ee4bcc55</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>james.grinter</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2012-05-31 13:18:01</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=02d98c5e9f5220007bb2ed93ee4bcc55"/> </record_update>
